body.p: Both before and after the amendments made in 2011, IAS 19 prohibits subsequent reclassification of remeasurements from other comprehensive income to profit or loss . The Board prohibited such reclassification because:

li.p: there is no consistent policy on reclassification to profit or loss in IFRSs, and it would have been premature to address this matter in the context of the amendments made to IAS 19 in 2011.
it is difficult to identify a suitable basis to determine the timing and amount of such reclassifications.
